thread.section_title: Cruisesalefinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruisesalefinder | cruisesalefinder.com.au
thread.title: Marilyn Porritt

author: Marilyn Porritt
title: Marilyn Porritt
text:
Wouldn't book with any other cruise agency. Have booked with Cruisesalefinder many times and always find the consultants extremely easy and helpful to deal with. Also, the website is user friendly to navigate.
Recently booked with Narelle in the absence of Jason. Thank you Narelle, for going the extra mile to get me the most suitable cabins for my upcoming cruise.
